thread.title: PETA Took Over All the Ads in a London Tube Station to Urge People to Go Vegan
thread.title_full: PETA Took Over All the Ads in a London Tube Station to Urge People to Go Vegan

title: PETA Took Over All the Ads in a London Tube Station to Urge People to Go Vegan
text:
Usually people are jerks about this sort of thing, but so far most of the comments we've seen online have been positive! 
If you want to know more about PETA's Tube Ad Takeover, click here .
Oh, and remember when an ad agency did this same thing, but with pictures of cats ? That was awesome. 
Submitted by: 
Tagged: ads , animals , London , peta , tube , Subway , vegan Share on Facebook
